definition: Huaying county level city in Guang'an 廣安|广安[Guang3 an1], Sichuan
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
Huaying county level city in Guang'an 廣安|广安[Guang3 an1], Sichuan

sentences.english: Huaying City has a good transport service and is rich in natural resources, with rapidly developing industry.
sentences.chinese: 華鎣市交通方便，資源豐富，工業發展較快。

sentences.english: It is a correct argument that Huayingshan fault zone is a fundamental fault.
sentences.chinese: 推斷華鎣山斷裂帶系基底斷裂的論點是正確的。

sentences.english: Here is the typical scenic spot of spring in Mt. Huaying gorge.
sentences.chinese: 此爲華鎣山大峽谷湧泉景觀的典型代表。

sentences.english: Miss Jiang used to lead the poor common people in resisting the grain levy and compulsory conscription.
sentences.chinese: 江姐曾經在華鎣山帶領窮苦百姓抗糧抗丁。
